name: Cavern of Jewels
description:
In this game I used the four-step process: introduce, develop, twist, and conclusion.

What I introduced in the fist little segment was the pivoting platforms, which was accomplished with the platform that had a safety net beneath it.  I further developed this with the jewel in the cavern pocket toward the entrance. The twist comes in the form of multiple pivoting platforms, which was surprisingly difficult to accomplish on 2 hours of sleep, and the conclusion comes from the pivoting platforms leading to a tree of Jewels.

Special thanks to:

Brackeys on YouTube for the helpful tutorials and starting mechanics and kit.

& Christmas Break for being the light at the end of the tunnel.
